summary: Test suite fails intermittently with DEADLINE_EXCEEDED errors when creating and describing schedules in CI, causing CI flakes that impact build reliability.
userImpact: Developers experience unreliable CI builds due to flaky schedule-related tests that fail intermittently with timeout errors.
rootCause: Context deadline exceeded in gRPC calls during schedule operations, likely due to insufficient timeout configuration or slow CI environment
resolutionDetails: Fixed by #1090 as indicated in comments
keyQuote: ServiceError: Failed to describe schedule... context deadline exceeded
